entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
